TechSummit 2025 - Call for Speakers

Annual technology conference
March 20-22, 2025 | 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM PST
San Francisco Convention Center
747 Howard St, San Francisco, CA 94103

Theme: AI, Cloud Computing, and Cybersecurity

Opening keynote: Dr. Jane Smith - "The Future of AI"
Multiple breakout tracks | Lunch provided daily
Evening reception on Day 1

Expected attendance: 2,000+ professionals worldwide

Registration: https://techsummit.com/register
Early bird (until Feb 28): $499 | Regular: $599 | Students: $99

Contact: info@techevents.com | +1-415-555-0123
Organized by TechEvents Inc

expected_json.description: Annual technology conference focusing on AI, cloud computing, and cybersecurity innovations
